phys::Attachable Class Reference

This is just a base class to be used by elements that are attachable to nodes. More...

 Enum value representing the type of element this is.

Detailed Description

This is just a base class to be used by elements that are attachable to nodes.

This class is useless on it's own and should not be created manually.
